## Excercises

A list of the R tutorials that may be helpful in understanding the topics covered in class:

### Week 1

[BIDA302: Introduction to R](https://monkmanmh.shinyapps.io/BIDA302_1-1_intro/?_ga=2.143188981.1105120215.1603418925-1358848496.1603418925)

[BIDA302: Transform Data - solutions](https://monkmanmh.shinyapps.io/BIDA302_1-2_transform_data)

* the hands-on excercises for Week 1 (and 2) as a tutorial exercise

[Data Manipulation using {dplyr} and {tidyr}](https://monkmanmh.shinyapps.io/R4SS_data_manipulation)

* from the Data Carpentry "R for Social Scientists"

* covers the "data wrangling" topics of week 1 and week 2, but using a different dataset
